name: Dancing Helix:Colorful Twister
description:
Beware of the most addictive music game of 2019.

The newest Amanotes game will have your eyes glued to the screen!

You are going to love these features:

◉ Thrilling beats
◉ Easy one-finger control
◉ Illustrative, tripping, bouncy graphic
◉ Updates of the newest EDM songs

How to master your playing skills:

1. Touch, Hold and Drag the ball to make it jump on the tiles.
2. Don't Fall on Color Tiles
3. Enjoy the awesome music and addictive challenges designed for each song

Special tip: Notice the ball's shadow

Free songs are waiting for you to grab !

Dancing Helix: Colorful Twister is the official games of Amanotes, a fast-growing app publisher from Vietnam with global reach.

Contact us:

Are you having problems? Send an email to support@amanotes.com
